You should update!

OSM tiles servers are overloaded. Please contact the OSM Operations Working Group if you can offer a caching server.

News

  • 2020-06-02 (stable version 16538)
    • Add Persian and Icelandic language
    • Switch to JOSM search syntax in Overpass Query Wizard
    • Improve cursor rendering on HiDPI screens
    • Add color chooser to presets, display the color in the properties dialog
    • Jump to Position: add jump to place name
  • 2020-04-06 (stable version 16239)
    • Add Arabic language
    • Add support for Eastern Arabic(-Indic) and Khmer numerals
  • 2020-02-26 (stable version 15937)
    • Maxar imageries are available again
    • Add links to regional/national taginfo instances of the Geofabrik - big thanks to the Geofabrik!
    • Improve Autofilters
    • The "Add tag" and "Change value" dialogs display the related preset/mappaint style icons on the okay button
  • More news ...
  • Active version '16239' should be updated! The current stable snapshot is 16538 and 16538 is the unstable development version.
  • Help translating JOSM into your language! Currently 100% of program texts are done.

Getting Started

  • Download some existing data from OSM using Download data on the File menu or the download button . If you have questions during your very first edit, the Introduction page will assist you.

Getting Help

  • Online help: Help on the Help menu or press F1 as required to get context sensitive help. Open Help now.
  • Join the forum or ask at help.openstreetmap.org

Remember the golden rules of OpenStreetMap:

  • Don't copy from other maps
  • Have fun!
